QueryForm.SectionViewDisableCheckedHiddenWarning:
Warning! 

Executing "Disable checked Hidden" will set the Valid of the checked Hidden sections to Disable, and update the settings written to the Hidden configuration file at the "path to PS4CheaterNeo\sections\[GAME_ID].conf" path. 

To revert, manual editing of the conf file is required, changing the Valid of the Hidden sections from False to True. 

Do you want to continue executing? 

Note: The Query window needs to Refresh Processes to incorporate the new Hidden conf settings.

OptionForm.description_PS4FWVersion: Enter PS4 FW Version (Confirm the fw version only when perform sendpayload)
OptionForm.description_UILanguage: Determine the language displayed. Default english.
OptionForm.description_UIFont: Determine the UI Font Family. Default SystemFonts.DefaultFont.
OptionForm.description_UIOpacity:
Determines the opacity of the window, the maximum is 1 (opaque), 
Default 0.95
OptionForm.description_CollapsibleContainer:
Determines whether to enable collapsible split container ui in Query and HexEditor and PointerFinder windows. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_CheatGridViewGroupByEnabled:
Determines whether to enable the GroupByEnabled feature in CheatGridView. 
When enabled, Cheat items will be grouped. 
If you have a large number of Cheat items, 
you may consider disabling this feature to speed up Cheat loading. 
After setting this, you need to restart the program for it to take effect. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_CheatGridGroupRefreshThresho:
To prevent excessive wait times during GroupRefresh, 
the GridView's GroupRefresh mechanism is activated only when the number of cheats is less than this value. 
Default is 10000.
OptionForm.description_PS4DBGMutexFactor:
It is not recommended to adjust this value, and changes take effect only after a restart. 
The Mutex factor determines the number of connections that PS4DBG can occupy during initialization. 
For ReadMemory, the number of connections is from 0 to (but not including) mutexFactor. 
For WriteMemory, the number of connections is from mutexFactor to (but not including) 2*mutexFactor. 
Default value is 3.
OptionForm.description_DisplayChangesListWhenSaving:
Determines whether to display the list of change options when saving in Option windows. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_CheatCellDirtyValueCommit:
Determine whether to automatically write to PS4 when editing cheat values in UpDown. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_CheatLock:
Determines whether to enable cheat lock in the main window. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_VerifySectionWhenLock:
Determine whether to enable verifying Section values when locking cheat items. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_CheatAutoRefresh:
Determines whether to enable Auto Refresh in main window. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_CheatAutoRefreshShowStatus:
Determines whether to display its execution status in the main window when CheatAutoRefresh is enabled. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_CheatAutoRefreshTimerInterva:
Determines the Interval of AutoRefreshTimer when AutoRefresh is enabled, in milliseconds. 
Default 2500
OptionForm.description_VerifySectionWhenRefresh:
Determine whether to enable verifying Section values when refreshing the cheat list. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_AutoPerformGetProcesses:
Determine whether to enable automatic perform get processes when opening the Query window. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_DefaultProcess:
Set the default selected program when perform get processes. 
Default is eboot.bin
OptionForm.description_MaxQueryThreads:
Enter the number of threads to use when querying. 
Default is 3 threads
OptionForm.description_QueryBufferSize:
Set the minimum buffer size (in MB) in querying and pointerFinder, 
enter 0 to not use buffer, setting this value to 0 is better when the total number of Sections in the game is low. 
If the game has more than a thousand Sections, Buffer must be set. 
Default value is 50
OptionForm.description_MinResultAccessFactor:
Access value directly by address when the number of query results for the same Section is less than this factor, 
used to control whether to read Section data completely, or directly access the value by address. 
Default value is 50
OptionForm.description_MinResultAccessFactorThresho:
Set a value for the section size (in bytes). 
The MinResultAccessFactor option will only take effect when the section size is greater than this value. 
Default size is 1048576(1MB)
OptionForm.description_UndoScan:
Determines whether to enable undo scan(revert to the previous scan result), 
if enabled, more memory needs to be used during scanning. 
Default enable
OptionForm.description_ScanAutoPause:
Determines whether to automatically pause the game when starting the scan in query. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_ScanAutoResume:
Determines whether to automatically resume the game when the scan is complete in query. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_ShowSearchSizeFirstScan:
Determines whether to show search size message when FirstScan. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_UnknownInitialScanDoNotSkip0:
Determines whether to enable not skipping values
 with a byte of 0 when the Compare Type is UnknownInitial in the Query window. 
Note: Enabling this option will significantly increase the number of results. 
Restart the Query window for the setting to take effect. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_FloatingResultExact:
Determines whether to make the calculation result of Floating(float, double) completely exact in query window, 
there can be 0.0001 difference in the old mechanism. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_FloatingSimpleValueExponents:
Determine the exponents value of the simple value of floating. 
Cheat Engine is set to 11 (2 to the 11th power = 2^11 = plus or minus 2048). 
Default value is 11
OptionForm.description_FilterQuery:
Determine whether to enable filtering Sections when opening the query window. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_SectionFilterKeys: Enter the filter value, the filter will be set here when listing Sections
OptionForm.description_FilterSizeQuery:
Determine whether to enable filtering Sections by size when opening the query window. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_SectionFilterSize: Filter out when section size is less than this value(unit is bytes)
OptionForm.description_MaxResultShow:
Enter the maximum number of displayed query results. 
will only affect the number of results displayed in the ResultView. 
Default value is 8192
OptionForm.description_SectionViewFullRowSelect:
Determine whether to enable the FullRowSelect feature in the SectionView of the Query window. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_SectionViewDetectHiddenSecti:
Determine whether to enable automatic detection of hidden sections. 
This is currently an experimental feature. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_DetectHiddenSectionStartFrom:
Determine whether to enable detecting hidden sections starting from the end address of the last section. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_LastHiddenSectionLengthHex:
Specify the Hex length of the last hidden section. 
This only takes effect when SectionViewDetectHiddenSection is enabled. 
Default value is 0x40000000.
OptionForm.description_HiddenSectionStartAtPrevious:
Determine whether to enable the starting address of the Hidden Section to be the end address of the previous section. 
If not enabled, the starting address will be the end address of the previous section plus 1. 
Default enable
OptionForm.description_WriteHiddenSectionConf:
Determine whether to enable writing detected hidden section configurations to the "path to PS4CheaterNeo\sections\[GAME_ID].conf" path. 
This option must be enabled when using the "SCAN for Hidden Sections" query window scan type. 
Note: Enabling this option will result in longer startup times for the Query window as it queries [GAME_ID] information every time the program starts. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_AutoRefresh:
Determines whether to enable Auto Refresh in HexEditor. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_AutoRefreshTimerInterval:
Determines the Interval of AutoRefreshTimer when AutoRefresh is enabled, in milliseconds, 
HexEditor needs to be restarted after this value is changed. 
Default 2500
OptionForm.description_HexInfoDash:
Determines the delimited dash value that displays the current Hex value in the HexEditor. 
Default "-"
OptionForm.description_AutoFindClosestChangedPositi:
Determines whether to enable automatic selection of the value change position 
closest to the current location when there is no input value for the find value. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_InputIsHexFormat:
Determines whether to enable the input format for searching as Hex in the HexEditor window. 
Default enabled
OptionForm.description_UsingLittleEndian:
Determines whether to enable using LittleEndian endianness, when the input format for the search is Hex, 
in the HexEditor window, if this option is not checked, it will use BigEndian. 
Default disabled
OptionForm.description_MainToolStrip1BackColor: Determine the Main ToolStrip1 background color
OptionForm.description_MainCheatGridViewRowIndexFor: Determine the Main CheatGridView RowIndex foreground color
OptionForm.description_MainCheatGridViewBackgroundC: Determine the Main CheatGridView background color
OptionForm.description_MainCheatGridViewBaseRowColo: Determine the Main CheatGridView base row color
OptionForm.description_MainCheatGridViewGridColor: Determine the Main CheatGridView grid color
OptionForm.description_MainCheatGridCellForeColor: Determine the Main dataGridViewCellStyle foreground color
OptionForm.description_MainCheatGridCellBackColor: Determine the Main dataGridViewCellStyle background color
OptionForm.description_QueryStatusStrip1BackColor: Determine the Query StatusStrip1 background color
OptionForm.description_QueryScanBtnBackColor: Determine the Query ScanBtn background color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewFilterForeCo: Determine the Query SectionView Filter foreground color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewFilterBackCo: Determine the Query SectionView Filter background color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewFilterSizeFo: Determine the Query SectionView FilterSize foreground color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewFilterSizeBa: Determine the Query SectionView FilterSize background color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewExecutableFo: Determine the Query SectionView executable foreground color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewNoNameForeCo: Determine the Query SectionView NoName foreground color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewNoName2ForeC: Determine the Query SectionView NoName2 foreground color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewHiddenForeCo: Determine the Query SectionView Hidden foreground color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewItemCheck1Ba: Determine the Query SectionView ItemCheck1 background color
OptionForm.description_QuerySectionViewItemCheck2Ba: Determine the Query SectionView ItemCheck2 background color
OptionForm.description_HexEditorChangedFinishForeCo: Determine the HexEditor ChangedFinish foreground color
OptionForm.description_HexEditorZeroBytesForeColor: Determine the HexEditor ZeroBytes foreground color
OptionForm.description_PointerFinderStatusStrip1Bac: Determine the PointerFinder statusStrip1 background color
OptionForm.description_PointerFinderScanBtnBackColo: Determine the PointerFinder ScanBtn background color
OptionForm.description_SendPayloadStatusStrip1BackC: Determine the SendPayload statusStrip1 background color
